meta.title: Retro Bowl - Manage Your Dream Football Team
meta.description: Join Retro Bowl to manage your NFL franchise, customize your team, and aim for Super Bowl victory!

hero.title: Retro Bowl
hero.subTitle: Step into the ultimate football management experience!

items.title: Team Customization
items.description: Edit player names, jerseys, and locations to create your dream team.

items.title: Dual Gameplay Mode
items.description: Enjoy the perfect mix of control and auto-play for a dynamic gaming experience.

items.title: Play Anytime, Anywhere
items.description: Available on PC, mobile, and tablet for convenient play, online or offline.

items.title: Franchise Management
items.description: Expand your roster and handle press duties to keep your team and fans satisfied.

items.text: Navigate using your mouse or trackpad and select options with the left mouse button.

items.question: Who created Retro Bowl?
items.answer: Retro Bowl is created by New Star Games Ltd., their first game on Poki.

items.question: Can you play Retro Bowl online and offline?
items.answer: Yes, Retro Bowl can be played both online and offline!

items.question: Can I play Retro Bowl on a phone or tablet?
items.answer: Absolutely! Retro Bowl is compatible with mobile devices on Poki.

items.question: How do you move in Retro Bowl?
items.answer: Click the blue circle under the player to move; swipe to navigate up and down.
